name: Size Chart Product For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Size Chart Product For Woocommerce helps you to customize and design the size chart.

Help your customers to select the right product size and make their purchase decision quickly

Size Chart Product For Woocommerce you can choose the available templates of the size chart with specific category ,specific product.

FEATURES FOR SIZE CHART PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy to use
  • Multiple chart add for one product
  • All chart to add title,size and multiple size you can add
  • Using Shortcode you can any place to chart
  • Add Delete multiple Row and column
  • Select popup loder image
  • Chart Avilable popup and product tab
  • Popup Customize with color,font size
  • Chart Also Allow shop page
  • Select chart button position in single product page
  • Shop page chart button position only before add to cart button
  • Chart Setting in mobile also
  • If you setup in any product than you just need select size selection
  • Font Color And Font-size all customized
  • customize tab setting with chart tab and chart description name
  • Enable/Disable Show tab wise content
  • Import Demo Chart Option
  • WPML Support

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Get Pro | ðŸŒŸ Support

FEATURES FOR SIZE CHART PRODUCT FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Chart sidebar popup avilable in single product page and shop page
  • Shop page chart button position select before and after add to cart button
  • Customize table heading background color and text color
  • Customize table even row, odd row and table data row font color
  • Add table border with border width, style and color

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Size Chart Product For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Size Chart Product For Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Size Chart Product For Woocommerce

Admin can use shortcode [scpfw_buttons product_id=id] to create dynamic Size Chart button in any page
